email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out with a freight offer for a shipment of crude oil from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a vessel available, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. The starting freight rate is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the offer. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Given the current market, we were hoping for something in the low 50s, say $50.75. Can you check with the owner? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I discussed your counteroffer with the owner. They’re willing to come down to $51.25 per metric ton, which is a fair rate given the vessel’s specifications and the current market. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. We can agree to $51.25, provided the laycan remains firm and the demurrage rate is reasonable. Can you confirm the demurrage terms? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, the laycan is confirmed for October 15-20. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. We’ll proceed with the MV Ocean Star at $51.25 per metric ton and the demurrage rate of $20,000 per day. Please send over the charter party for review. Thanks, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ll have the charter party drafted and sent over by end of day. Thanks for your cooperation, and let me know if there’s anything else you need. Best regards, Sarah
